entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
